scripts.build:shared: npm --prefix shared/state install && npm --prefix shared/state run build && npm --prefix shared/jules install && npm --prefix shared/jules run build && npm --prefix shared/gemini install && npm --prefix shared/gemini run build && npm --prefix shared/github install && npm --prefix shared/github run build
scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm --prefix services/monolith install && npm --prefix services/monolith run build
